As a pretext of the sufferings of the past, today those who try to accuse Turkey and our nationality are unfair before everything else.
@SpiegelPeter Modesty is the color of virtue ;-)
Those who try to admit Turkey, like the genocide, to an absolutely real thing that has never happened in the past are in a futile struggle.
Decisions taken in the parliament in this regard are absent for us. Turkey has no problems with the Armenian people.
I repeat the call of friendship to Armenia. Come on, let's put it on historic history. Let us build a new future in the light of our common past.

The advisory tweets now excerpts from the speech of the president during the tenure of Henrique Eduardo Alves in @MTurismo.
"Anything that holds women back holds back the entire country." —President Obama #EqualPayNow
My first words are warmly grateful to Minister Vinicius Lages, for his dedication, professionalism and commitment c / q acted.
Lages brought great technical knowledge about the tourism industry and, with intense work, was perfectly integrated into our team.
I welcome Henrique Alves, partner of many hours in the National Congress, to whom I wish much work and luck in the new functions.
His presence at my side reinforces our administrative capacity and political action - two characteristics indispensable to qlq government.
. @ narendramodi & I paid respects to the victims of # airindiaflight182, an act of terror we will not soon forget. http://t.co/WLz2nO7bwV
Henrique Alves arrives at @MTurismo with various tasks and a great challenge. We are 477 days from the start of the Rio de Janeiro Olympic Games.
"Things like paid leave, paid sick days, child care, equal pay—these are family issues and these are economic issues." —President Obama
The 2014 World Cup projected, very positively, the image of Brazilian tourism in the rest of the world Brazil and abroad.
Tourism is a non-polluting, profitable industry of immense importance for the generation of employment and regional development.
In Brazil, the tourism industry accounts for almost 4% of GDP and maintains about 3 million direct jobs.
"We shouldn't have to choose between rewarding work and raising a family." —President Obama
We have created #Pronatec courses to qualify the workforce in the tourism segment.
We have already benefited more than 180 thousand young people and workers in 54 courses in the tourism, leisure, hospitality and language sectors, and we are going to advance even more.
Brazil has everything to be one of the biggest tourist destinations in the world and the biggest tourist destination of its own people.
Here, the tourist travels by different accents, different cultures and customs, knows incomparable habits and gastronomic riches.
And no less important, it knows one of the countries of greater and more varied natural wealth of the planet.
I welcome the Minister Henrique Alves, calling him to work hard so that Brazil is every day + enabled (...)
(...) to welcome tourists from all over the world.
